name: hashbrown::map::map::HashMap<K, V, S, A>::get_key_value_mut
code: pub fn get_key_value_mut<Q>(&mut self, k: &Q) -> Option<(&K, &mut V)>
// Avoid `Option::map` because it bloats LLVM IR.
Some(&mut (ref key, ref mut value)) => Some((key, value)),

conds.cond: self.get_inner_mut(k) matches Some(&mut (ref key, ref mut value))
self.get_inner_mut(k) matches Some(&mut (ref key, ref mut value))
